title: Zual zelin ka fak chak hle che
lyrics:
Zual zelin ka fak chak hle che,
Lal Isu, ka Chhandamtu;
I mi khawngaih zarah te hian,
Hmangaih zual zel che ka duh.

Zual zelin, zual zelin,
Zual zelin hmangaih zual che ka duh;
Zual zelin, zual zelin,
Hmangaih zual zel che ka duh Lalpa.

I thatnain min vur zelin,
Min enkawlna pawh nemin;
Ka ngaihlu, hemi avang hian,
Hmangaih zual zel che ka duh.

Thil hrehawm lungngaihthlak takin,
Khawdur angte hian min khuh;
Min khuh mah se, i kiantir thin,
Hmangaih zual zel che ka duh.

He khawvela ka awm chhungin,
Vanram nuam ka thlen thlengin;
Hei hi ka duhsam ber niin,
Hmangaih zual zel che ka duh.
